title: Yajin Tensei - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Game Elements   Goblins   Level System   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Yajin   野人
description:
Hitoshi Nozaki saves a man, but instead, he is run over by a truck and dies.

He is called by God and forced to go to another world.

When he asks God if it’s not a transfer since his appearance is still the same, he is told that it is.When he asks God if it is transference, he is told that it is a reincarnation because his body will be reborn for the other world, and he is sent to the diverse world without saying a word.

What is the fate of Hitoshi Nozaki, who is reincarnated naked in the forest without any explanation?>
